CustomField.description: Indicates whether the record is currently visible in lookups, indicating a valid selection. Inactive records may still exist and be referenced by existing records, but no new references can be made.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the record is currently visible in lookups, indicating a valid selection. Inactive records may still exist and be referenced by existing records, but no new references can be made.
CustomField.label: Is Active
